MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the DG9 postcode area of Stranraer. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 7.19pm. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of the extent of the repairs required to our underground electricity network near the Stoneykirk Road substation and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 3am. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 9:39pm on Tuesday, 27 October 2020
